Validate a standardized weather table

Source: R/validate_weather.R
validate_weather.Rd

Validate a standardized weather table

Usage

validate_weather(
  df,
  temp_bounds = c(-60, 60),
  rain_max = 200,
  snow_max = Inf,
  check_precip_consistency = TRUE,
  swe_ratio = 10
)

Arguments

df

Tibble from read_weather_csv() with at least date and station.

temp_bounds

numeric(2). Allowed °C range for temps. Default c(-60, 60).

rain_max

numeric(1). Max plausible daily rain (mm). Default 200.

snow_max

numeric(1). Max plausible daily snow (cm). Default Inf.

check_precip_consistency

logical. Check precip vs rain/SWE. Default TRUE.

swe_ratio

numeric(1). mm water per cm snow (SWE). Default 10.

Value

list(summary = tibble, flags = tibble)
